name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp Link & QR Generator | Click to Chat by Spur

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate WhatsApp links and QR codes to quickly send messages. Select a number, right-click, and choose 'Send via WhatsApp' option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly send WhatsApp messages by selecting a number, right click and select send via WhatsApp option. This extension generates both a click to chat link and QR code to quickly scan and send via your mobile phone as well.
